positions.title: Fellow Researcher
positions.institution: CAPES – Brazilian federal agency under Ministry of Education
positions.description: Development of Ph.D. research on educommunicative scholastic journalism. Events organization. Lectures and paper presentations. Articles writing.

positions.title: Educational Technology Analyst
positions.institution: Educom.Saúde-SP Project (Secretary of Health of State of São Paulo)
positions.description: Virtual Learning Environment maintenance and update. HTML and CSS development of educational objects. Moodle's data extraction by native resources and web scraping. Data treatment and analysis with SQLite. Data visualization with Excel. Technical support to live video conferences. Assistance to the E-Learning Manager.

positions.title: Acting Professor
positions.description: I taught the disciplines of Communication Technologies, Digital Journalism, and Graphic Planning. I also was part of the team of professors responsible for guiding laboratory productions of a digital magazine.

positions.title: Consultant in Communication and Marketing
positions.description: Digital media management, including updating WordPress websites and developing landing pages. Art direction and content writing for internal and commercial communication materials. Relationship with advertising agencies, press office, and other suppliers. Organization of events.

positions.title: Communication Internship
positions.description: Website development in PHP (full-stack). Planning and organization of projects and events. Art direction and content writing. Lectures.
